scripts.build:android: npm run mkdist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform android --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.android.jsbundle --assets-dest dist/res
scripts.build:ios: npm run mkdist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.ios.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
scripts.build:macos: npm run mkdist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform macos --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.macos.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
scripts.build:visionos: npm run mkdist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.visionos.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
scripts.ci:fabric:ios: RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 pod install --project-directory=ios && npx react-native run-ios --no-packager
scripts.ci:fabric:ios-static-framework: USE_FRAMEWORKS=static RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 pod install --project-directory=ios && npx react-native run-ios --no-packager
scripts.ci:fabric:ios-dynamic-framework: USE_FRAMEWORKS=dynamic RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 pod install --project-directory=ios && npx react-native run-ios --no-packager
